paragraph.iam: 👨 I'm <age></age> and from the <city>Tricity area</city> in Poland.
paragraph.relationship: ❤️ Taken by cutiest dog in da world.
paragraph.fandom: 🦊 I'm a <furry>furry</furry>, and my <furref>fursona</furref> is Arctic fox.
paragraph.passion1: 📷  I love taking photos—animals, nature, and even still life.
paragraph.musictaste: 🎧  My music taste is pure chaos — here's <playlist>my playlist</playlist>.
paragraph.dream: 🌍 I dream of traveling across Europe and visiting the USA.

paragraph.description: This is <highlight>Nivereq</highlight>, though his friends often just call him <highlight>Nivi</highlight> or <highlight>Niver</highlight>. He's an incredibly fluffy Arctic fox, whose fur is so soft it seems to invite hugs. There's nothing Nivereq loves more than a good squeeze. He's not only fluffy but also exceptionally gentle and friendly, and his warm aura makes everyone around him feel at ease.
